docs.snippet: President Donald Trump warned in a phone call with his Mexican counterpart that he was ready to send U.S. troops to stop "bad hombres down there" unless the Mexican military does more to control them, according to an excerpt of a transcript of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump warned in a phone call with his Mexican counterpart that he was ready to send U.S. troops to stop "bad hombres down there" unless the Mexican military does more to control them, according to an excerpt of a transcript of the conversation obtained by The Associated Press.

headline.main: Trump to Mexico: Take Care of 'Bad Hombres' or US Might
headline.print_headline: Trump to Mexico: Take Care of 'Bad Hombres' or US Might

docs.snippet: Former NFL Commissioner Paul Tagliabue is apologizing for remarks he made decades ago about concussions in football....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former NFL Commissioner Paul Tagliabue is apologizing for remarks he made decades ago about concussions in football.

docs.snippet: Chilean President Michelle Bachelet on Wednesday denied reports she received financial support for her 2013 campaign from a construction conglomerate that is involved in Brazil's huge corruption scandal....

headline.main: Chile: Bachelet Denies Receiving Campaign Financing From OAS
headline.print_headline: Chile: Bachelet Denies Receiving Campaign Financing From OAS

docs.snippet: Legal permanent U.S. residents from seven countries whose citizens are covered by a three-month American travel ban won't need special permission to come back to the United States after all, the Trump administration announced Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Legal permanent U.S. residents from seven countries whose citizens are covered by a three-month American travel ban won't need special permission to come back to the United States after all, the Trump administration announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Admin Clarifies, Again, Travel Ban Rules for Legal Residents

docs.snippet: A last-minute own goal by Newcastle's Ciaran Clark cost his side the chance to go back to the top of the Championship as they were held to a 2-2 draw by Queens Park Rangers on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A last-minute own goal by Newcastle's Ciaran Clark cost his side the chance to go back to the top of the Championship as they were held to a 2-2 draw by Queens Park Rangers on Wednesday.

headline.main: Late Own Goal Denies Newcastle Championship Top Spot
headline.print_headline: Late Own Goal Denies Newcastle Championship Top Spot

docs.snippet: AS Roma needed a penalty from 40-year-old forward Francesco Totti in the seventh minute of stoppage time to scrape past second-tier Cesena 2-1 in their Coppa Italia quarter-final on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Totti's Stoppage-Time Penalty Sinks Second-Tier Cesena

docs.snippet: A former senior executive of Tenet Healthcare Corp has been indicted on charges that he participated in a scheme to pay bribes for patient referrals, enabling the U.S. hospital chain to fraudulently bill state Medicaid programs for $400 million....
